data.content:
Danh từ
(+between) sự giống nhau, sự tương tự
the teacher draws an analogy between the human heart and a pump
thầy giáo vạch ra những điểm giống nhau giữa quả tim con người với một cái bơm
(+ with) (triết học) phép loại suy

noun
plural -gies
[count] :a comparison of two things based on their being alike in some way
He drew/made an analogy between flying a kite and fishing. [=he compared flying a kite to fishing; he said that flying a kite was like fishing]
[noncount] :the act of comparing two things that are alike in some way
coining new words by analogy to/with existing ones [=coining new words so that they are formed in a way similar to old ones]
reasoning by analogy
